headline: Senior DevOps Engineer at Syncro Group

description.text:
Build and scale cloud infrastructure in a fast-growing tech company

Syncro Group is a listed tech group with companies active in influencer marketing, campaign management, and recruitment. We develop platforms that connect creators, brands, and agencies — and we’re in a phase of rapid development and product expansion.

We are now looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to help us build, automate, and scale our AWS infrastructure.

Why Join Us?

High level of technical freedom and impact
A small, tight-knit team with short decision-making paths
Work 100% remotely or from our Stockholm office
Competitive salary, pension, and wellness allowance


About the Role

You’ll play a key role in our tech team, working closely with developers and UX to drive efforts around CI/CD, cloud infrastructure, and operational reliability. The role involves both building new infrastructure and improving existing environments. You'll work closely with product and development in an agile and solution-oriented setup.

Key Responsibilities

Design and maintain scalable cloud infrastructure in AWS
Automate deployment workflows and CI/CD pipelines
Work with container and serverless technologies
Implement monitoring, logging, and observability tools
Support development teams with infrastructure and environments
Object-oriented programming in JavaScript, PHP, or Python


Our Tech Stack (Examples)

Compute & Containers: ECS, Lambda, EC2, Docker
Storage & Databases: S3, RDS, ElastiCache
CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Serverless Framework
Monitoring & Logging: CloudWatch, Elastic Stack
Networking & Security: IAM, VPC, Route 53


 What We’re Looking For

Solid experience with DevOps and cloud infrastructure (preferably AWS)
Proficiency in object-oriented programming language such as JavaScript, PHP, or Python
Experience working with CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, and automation
Hands-on experience with containers or serverless environments
Ability to take ownership and proactively drive improvements


 Preferred Qualifications

Experience with databases, testing tools, or DNS configuration


How to Apply

Excited about the role? Great! We’d love to hear from you — apply with your CV and we’ll get in touch regarding the next steps.

This recruitment is managed by Job Solution Consulting. All inquiries regarding the position should be directed to Job Solution Consulting. For questions, feel free to reach out to:

fredrik.hovstadius@jobsolution.se
